examples.name: Update Milestone Demo (Read-Only)
examples.output:
📖 READ-ONLY DEMO: How to update a milestone


To update (code example - NOT executed):

    from agents.drawdocs.tools import update_milestone_api
    
    success = update_milestone_api(
        loan_id=loan_id,
        milestone_name="Docs Ordered",
        status="Finished",
        comment="DOCS Out on 12/01/2025"
    )
    
⚠️  Actual update NOT performed (read-only mode)

    from agents.drawdocs.tools import add_milestone_log
    
    success = add_milestone_log(
        loan_id=loan_id,
        milestone_name="Docs Ordered",
        comment="Documents sent to title company",
        done_by="AutomationAgent"
    )
    
⚠️  Actual log NOT added (read-only mode)

examples.name: Legacy vs New Comparison
examples.output:
📖 COMPARISON: Legacy vs New Approach (Read-Only)
============================================================

LEGACY APPROACH (Field-Based):
------------------------------------------------------------
Code example:

    update_milestone(
        loan_id=loan_id,
        status="Finished",
        comment="DOCS Out on 12/01/2025"
    )
    
Limitations:
  ❌ Only updates hardcoded 'Docs Out' fields
  ❌ No access to milestone history
  ❌ Can't query milestone status
  ❌ Can't work with other milestones

NEW APPROACH (API-Based):
------------------------------------------------------------
Code example:

    update_milestone_api(
        loan_id=loan_id,
        milestone_name="Docs Ordered",  # Any milestone!
        status="Finished",
        comment="DOCS Out on 12/01/2025"
    )
    
Benefits:
  ✅ Works with ANY milestone name
  ✅ Full milestone history available
  ✅ Can query status, logs, dates
  ✅ Can add logs independently

Current Milestone Data (from API):
------------------------------------------------------------
Milestone not found

⚠️  No writes performed (read-only mode)
